name: abusively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that uses rude and offensive words: I will not tolerate being spoken to so abusively. The comedian was heckled abusively by some parts of the audience.
in a way that uses physical violence or emotional cruelty: The children had been treated abusively by their parents for many years. The dogs had been kept abusively in the most appalling conditions.
More examplesFewer examplesThe players were greeted abusively when they ran on to the field.It's hard to understand why he was denounced so abusively on social media.He was found guilty of having behaved abusively towards his colleague.
